resources.string: Natural Harmonia Gropius, or more commonly known as N, is a major antagonist of the Black and White versions. He is the leader (or, as said by Team Plasma members, the king) of Team Plasma. He also has the ability to understand and speak to Pokémon.
Zoroark is a bipedal, gray-brown, fox-like Pokémon with crimson and black accents. It has a pointed snout and ears with red insides.
